settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/support/settings/general/tell-my-script-where-to-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: This explainer page has been provided by [Sweet Tooth](https://www.sweettoothrewards.com). Please email help@sweettoothhq.com if you need any assistance with setting this up.

settings.label: Enter description about your loyalty program
settings.default: To demonstrate how much we cherish our loyal customers, you can gain reward points in more ways than purchasing your favorite products.

settings.label: Number of points for an account creation
Number of points for liking on Facebook
Number of points for sharing on Facebook
Number of points for following on Twitter
Number of points for sharing on Twitter
Number of points for following on Instagram
Number of points awarded on birthday
Number of points awarded for writing a review

settings.default: Here at our store, we firmly believe that sharing is caring. So now you've discovered our plant-powered products, it's time to get social. Invite your friends to our store and be instantly rewarded with reward points. And if they love them just as much as you do, you will continue to be rewarded again and again!
settings.label: Description for your referral program
Number of points for referring a friend

settings.default: Now that you have some hard earned points, here's how you can spend them.
settings.label: Description for spending points
Points value for gift card reward
Dollar value for gift card reward
Answer for Question 1
settings.default: You can spend your points by click on the points tab while logged into your customer account. Under the Reward section, you can click Redeem next to the reward you want to claim it!You can spend your points by click on the points tab while logged into your customer account. Under the Reward section, you can click Redeem next to the reward you want to claim it!

settings.label: Question 2
settings.default: How much does it cost to join?

settings.label: Answer for Question 2
settings.default: Our loyalty program is totally free! We do it to say 'thank you' to our awesome customers!

settings.label: Question 3
settings.default: Is there a limit to how many order points I can get?

settings.label: Answer for Question 3
settings.default: Of course not! We want to reward your loyal orders!
